verbs.description: pfizer bain launch [ARG1: a startup] to [V: focus] [ARG2: on nervous system diseases] not long ago pfizer inc said it was getting out of the business of developing drugs for parkinson and alzheimer diseases but the new york - based pharmaceutical giant appears to be hedging its bets pfizer and bain capital lp the boston global investment firm cofounded by mitt romney plan to announce tuesday that they are launching a biopharmaceutical startup that will work on medicines for people with parkinson alzheimer and other pfizer inc bain capital life sciences pfizer bain life sciences bain capital private equity bain capital alzheimer bain capital lp nervous system bain
